thread.title: Dhruva Natchathiram teaser: Vikram-Gautham's film is Tamil cinema's answer to Bourne series - India Today
thread.title_full: Dhruva Natchathiram teaser: Vikram-Gautham's film is Tamil cinema's answer to Bourne series - India Today

title: Dhruva Natchathiram teaser: Vikram-Gautham's film is Tamil cinema's answer to Bourne series - India Today
text:
ALSO READ: Trisha Krishnan deactivates Twitter over jallikattu row 
Going by teaser, John (Vikram) is a CIA agent, who's headed by a person called K. The antagonist, who goes by the name Darkman, helds K in captivity thereby forcing John to return to Delhi. Sporting a salt and pepper look, Vikram looks handsome as ever. Needless to say, the teaser was worth for all the hype mounted on the film. 
Dhruva Natchathiram is a spy thriller made on the lines of the Bourne series. Gautham is also planning to rope in a leading Bollywood star for a crucial role in the film. Anu Emmanuel will play the leading lady. 
It must be noted that Gautham originally planned to direct Dhruva Natchathiram with Suriya in the lead. However, the latter opted out of the project and had a major fallout with Gautham. 
To be produced by Ondraga Entertainment along with another leading production house, Dhruva Natchathiram is expected to release in August. 
Here's the teaser: To get the latest entertainment news and gossip, follow us on Twitter @Showbiz_IT and Like us on facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
